TEXT.S:
= Gmarang Kari utux = Gmarang paah quwaq pusu rudan,pniyahan ta it's sejiq Truku u mnseupu paah mntucing qhuni mi mntucing paah btunux.pusu rudan ta u pllealay balay u pnspuan kingal qhuni mi btunux.smkau qhuni mi smka u btunux, niqan kingal jiyax,smriyu paah qhuni hiya ka kingal Snaw mi kingal Qrijil. msawpu kadhiya du niqan kalaqi mi laqi laqi da.kingal dungal ka Kari u pusu rudan ta u pnaah kingal beyhing balay bling. Balay bi ka quri pniyahan u tkdaya. Tuuda. Truku 3kluwan ni u niqan nanak bqrus utux. Bqrus btunux.suyang dxral ka ini pndka Kari dha. Saw ka was mniq Nyusan Bsuring Qlhangan Skangki ryaxan hidaw mi quri truma Tamunan Bunobung(Bnbung) btnux utux. Btnux bhoway.tasil btnux Mutang) Kika pusu balay pnatas dha.
=
